titles.title: Expressing gratitude for the foreign guest laborers, known as Braceros, who worked in the United States during the period from 1942 to 1964.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

bill.summary: 10/1/2007--Introduced. Expresses gratitude to the foreign guest laborers, known as Braceros, who worked in the United States from 1942 to 1964. Recognizes the Braceros for their contributions to the war effort during World War II and their hard work which helped keep the United States strong and prosperous during this challenging period.
